sentences.en: a campaign to stiffen rules against drink-driving
sentences.cn: 要求对酒后驾车严加管制的运动

sentences.en: As soon as he touched her she seemed to wince and stiffen.
sentences.cn: 只消他碰到她,她便一阵畏缩,全身僵硬.

sentences.en: He touched her, and she stiffened.
He tried to stiffen his wavering soldiers.
sentences.cn: 他企图使动摇的士兵坚强起来.

sentences.en: His courage seemed suddenly to stiffen of its own accord.
sentences.cn: 他猛可里满心充满了勇气.

sentences.en: I felt my body involuntarily stiffen against her invasion of my personal space.
sentences.cn: 随着她不断侵入我的个人空间，我感觉全身都不由自主地紧绷起来。
我一定要给德里麦打气.

sentences.en: I noticed him stiffen when I mentioned money.
sentences.cn: 当我提到钱时,我注意到他变得不自然.

sentences.en: I was breathing hard, and my legs were beginning to stiffen.
sentences.cn: 这时我却气吁喘喘地开始感到脚有点僵硬.
人一上年纪,关节就变僵硬了.

sentences.en: The blood supply to the skin is reduced when muscles stiffen.
sentences.cn: 当肌肉变得僵硬时，皮肤的供血量就减少了。

sentences.en: The German was moving to stiffen up the garrison in Sicily.
sentences.cn: 德军正在加强西西里守军之力量.

sentences.en: Their opposition only stiffened my resolve .
sentences.cn: 他们的反对只是更加坚定了我的决心。

sentences.en: These clothes restrict your freedom of movement and stiffen up the whole body.
sentences.cn: 这些衣服使你行动不便，让全身都变得不灵活。

sentences.en: This lignification serves to stiffen and strengthen the cells.
sentences.cn: 木质化足以使细胞变硬和增强.

sentences.en: We must stiffen them all up and allow no weakness.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要使他们都坚强起来,不允许有丝毫软弱.

sentences.en: You will only stiffen his resolve.
Your job is to stiffen linen with starch.
sentences.cn: 你的工作是把亚麻台布浆洗硬了.
